p2f.nml

00001 !< \file p2f.nml
00002 !! The p2f.nml file is the input fortran namelist. The default variables are set in read_namelist
00004 
00005 &P2FIN
00006 nP = 1000000
00007 gParticle = .false.
00008 particleSize = 2.5e-04
00009 pl_fileName = 'data/dlg_mod_list.nc'
00010 eqdsk_fileName = 'data/g129x129_1051206002.01120.cmod'
00011 vPerInRange = 1.0
00012 vParInRange = 0.5
00013 vPerp_nBins = 16 
00014 vPar_nBins = 32 
00015 R_nBins = 30 
00016 z_nBins = 30 
00017 amu = 1.0
00018 NFO = .true.
00019 noAveraging = .true.
00020 pList_is_nCDF = .true.
00021 sR = 20 
00022 weightLimit = 5.0e18
00023 plotOrbit = .false.
00024 traceStepLength = 0.002
00025 usePtsPerTrack = 50 
00026 /
